About

About Us

We are a blog showcasing all the taco places metro Indy has to offer.

We do not rate the taco places, but want to give all the different local taco places a shout so you, the reader, can pick one and give it a try! 

Jobs fill your pockets, tacos fill your soul.

Our Mission

Through our blog, we love to give everyone guidance and inspiration to try all the different local taco places in Indianapolis metro area.

Purpose

I developed this website for two reasons: 1) to utilize my web development skills and 2) to share my love of tacos. Indianapolis is blessed with many excellent taco places so I thought I would combine both the love of tacos and love of technology for everyone!

I am running this site on Nuxt and using Agility CMS as the backend. It will be hosted on Amazon AWS. I will provide a breakdown of the process and share the website files in the near future.
